career.name: Smart Food Safe Pvt.Ltd
career.title: Software Engineer
description: Owned the design and development of three core modules in a multi-tenant MERN platform, enhancing risk-based scoring and digital specifications workflows.
Shipped a MERN-stack application featuring authentication, reusable UI components, and a digital signature workflow, utilizing JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Deployed applications on AWS EC2 with S3 assets, employing CI/CD practices through Jenkins to streamline development cycles.
Optimized data-heavy table load times from ~10s to ~3s and reduced API latency from 4â€“5s to ~1s through query tuning, payload reduction, and caching strategies.
